client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM is a close family friend of Neumann Schäfer Weber's parents, having known him since birth. This deep-rooted connection has facilitated a strong and trustworthy professional relationship.
Neumann Schäfer Weber is a 25 year old Investment Banker from Germany.
Attracted by Julius Baer's reputation for excellence, he chose to join for the bespoke financial solutions offered.
client_description_Family_Background: Neumann Schäfer Weber and Fabienne have been married since 2025. They do not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
Neumann obtained his secondary school diploma from Bismarck-Gymnasium Karlsruhe in 2018.
Neumann attended Freiburg University of Education and graduated in 2024.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Neumann Schäfer Weber is a 25 year old Investment Banker from Germany.
Neumann Schäfer Weber's first role was as a Investment Banker at Allianz SE, where he worked diligently from 2024 till now to establish a strong reputation.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
He managed to save approximately 10000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
Client does not have any properties.He inherited a significant sum of 1000000 EUR from his grandfather, a respected Stock Trader, in 2016, which he has wisely invested.
client_description_Client_Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome him as a new client.
